account_support.password_reset: I can help you reset your password. Please check your email for a password reset link, or click 'Forgot Password' on the login page.
account_support.account_locked: Your account appears to be locked for security reasons. I'll send you a verification link to unlock it, or you can contact our support team for immediate assistance.
account_support.profile_update: To update your profile information, go to Account Settings in your dashboard. If you need help with specific changes, let me know!
account_support.general: I'm here to help with your account. What specific issue are you experiencing?

order_status.tracking: I can help you track your order. Please provide your order number, and I'll get you the latest shipping information.
order_status.delayed: I understand delays can be frustrating. Let me check the status of your order and provide you with an updated delivery estimate.
order_status.not_arrived: If your order hasn't arrived within the expected delivery window, I can help you investigate. Please provide your order number.
order_status.general: I'll be happy to help you check on your order. Do you have your order number handy?

billing_payment.refund: I can assist with refund requests. Typically refunds are processed within 5-7 business days. Let me check your specific situation.
billing_payment.double_charge: I apologize for any billing errors. Let me look into this double charge issue for you. Please provide the transaction details.
billing_payment.payment_method: You can update your payment method in your account settings, or I can guide you through the process.
billing_payment.general: I'm here to help with billing questions. What specific issue can I assist you with?

product_inquiry.availability: Let me check the availability of that product for you. What specific item are you interested in?
product_inquiry.features: I'd be happy to explain the features of our products. Which product would you like to know more about?
product_inquiry.specifications: I can provide detailed specifications for any of our products. Which one are you interested in?
product_inquiry.general: I can help you learn more about our products. What would you like to know?

returns_exchanges.return_policy: Our return policy allows returns within 30 days of purchase with proof of receipt. Items must be in original condition.
returns_exchanges.defective: I'm sorry you received a defective item. We'll process a replacement or refund right away. Please provide your order details.
returns_exchanges.wrong_item: I apologize for sending the wrong item. We'll arrange for the correct product to be sent and a return label for the incorrect one.
returns_exchanges.general: I can help you with returns and exchanges. What would you like to do?

technical_support.login_issue: Let's troubleshoot your login problem. Have you tried resetting your password or clearing your browser cache?
technical_support.error_message: I can help diagnose error messages. Please describe the error you're seeing and when it occurs.
technical_support.slow_performance: Slow performance can have several causes. Let's try some troubleshooting steps to improve your experience.
technical_support.general: I'm here to help with technical issues. Can you describe the problem you're experiencing?

complaint.acknowledged: I sincerely apologize for your experience. Your feedback is important to us. Let me see how I can make this right.
complaint.escalation: I understand your frustration. I'd like to escalate this to a supervisor who can provide additional assistance.
complaint.quality_issue: I'm sorry the quality didn't meet your expectations. We take these concerns seriously and will work to resolve this.
complaint.general: I apologize that we didn't meet your expectations. Please tell me more so I can help resolve this.

general_inquiry.hours: Our customer service is available Monday-Friday 9:00 AM - 8:00 PM, Saturday 10:00 AM - 6:00 PM. You can reach us 24/7 through this chat.
general_inquiry.contact: You can reach us by phone at 1-800-SUPPORT, email at support@company.com, or through this live chat system.
general_inquiry.shipping: We offer standard shipping (5-7 business days) and expedited shipping (2-3 business days). International shipping is also available.

greeting.initial: Hello! I'm your AI customer service assistant. I can help with orders, account issues, billing questions, and more. How can I assist you today?
greeting.returning: Welcome back! How can I help you today?

clarification.unclear: I want to make sure I understand your request correctly. Could you please provide more details?
clarification.multiple_intents: I notice you have several questions. Let's address them one by one to ensure I help you properly.

escalation.human_needed: Based on your request, I'd like to connect you with a human agent who can provide more personalized assistance.
escalation.frustrated_user: I understand this is frustrating. Let me connect you with a senior support representative who can better assist you.
